sizes_available: XS - S - M - L - XL - XXL - XXXL
full_text: Knitted jacket with short sleeves in 1 strand DROPS Melody or 2 strands DROPS Brushed Alpaca Silk. Piece is knitted top down in stocking stitch with European yoke. Size XS – XXXL. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #mistystonecardigan DROPS design: Pattern ml-131 Yarn group D SIZE : XS - S - M - L - XL - XXL - XXXL YARN : DROPS MELODY from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group D) 200-250-250-250-300-350-350 g colour 04, Grey Or use: DROPS BRUSHED ALPACA SILK from Garnstudio (belongs to yarn group C) 200-250-250-250-300-350-350 g colour 03, Grey BUTTONS : DROPS BUTTON NO 710: 6 pieces for all sizes NEEDLES : DROPS CIRCULAR NEEDLE SIZE 5 mm: Length 40 and 80 cm. DROPS CIRCULAR NEEDLE SIZE 3.5 mm: Length: 80 cm DROPS DOUBLE POINTED NEEDLES SIZE 5 mm DROPS DOUBLE POINTED NEEDLES SIZE 3.5 mm The technique MAGIC LOOP can be used – you then only need circular needle of 80 cm in each size. KNITTING TENSION : 16 stitches in width and 20 rows vertically in stocking stitch and 1 strand DROPS Melody or 2 strands DROPS Brushed Alpaca Silk on needle size 5 mm = 10 x 10 cm. REMEMBER: Needle size is only a suggestion! If you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger sized needles or if you get too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller sized needles.
name: Ravelry: 264-31 Misty Stone Cardigan pattern by DROPS design
